note: Explicit below-MZ EFT policy for QED running: EW gauge bosons integrated out at MZ, charged-fermion thresholds applied with 1-loop MSbar running (log-only, continuous at μ=m_f).

ew_decoupling.assumption: W/Z/H integrated out at μ=MZ for the QED-only EFT used by below_mt_eft_cascade.

qed_running.beta_function: dα/d ln μ = (2/(3π)) α^2 Σ_f N_c Q_f^2
qed_running.threshold_matching: 1-loop MSbar, log-only; matching at μ=m_f is continuous at this order

active_fields.source: massless EFT light-quark placeholder below MZ
massless EFT light-quark placeholder below MZ
massless EFT light-quark placeholder below MZ
